channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Plus Server

item.title: CVE-2023-27863|2024-08-02T12:23:29.471Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus%20server
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus Server 10.1.13, under specific configurations, could allow an elevated user to obtain SMB credentials that may be used to access vSnap data stores. IBM X-Force ID: 249325.
